sub-list.name: Nodejs
sub-list.code:
>install heroku cli

heroku login

make sure the project is a git repository

>heroku git:remote -a chat-app-jk

commit changes to masters

>git push heroku masters

app cannot be run on heroku now it will give application error

create Procfile

inside the proc file put
web: node index.js

Set the port in heroku
we can use only the port given by heroku
The port number is available in the variable

process.env.PORT

sub-list.name: Start drawing in canvas
sub-list.code:
<script>
var c = document.getElementById("myCanvas");
var ctx = c.getContext("2d");
ctx.moveTo(0, 0);
ctx.lineTo(200, 100);
ctx.stroke();
</script>

Text
sub-list.description: The second two arguments are the X and Y position
